name: Shylesh S
title: Full Stack Developer
description: Full Stack Developer specializing in web and mobile app development with ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS, React Native, and TypeScript. Experienced in building scalable microservices, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and developing AI-powered solutions.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Leading web and mobile app development with focus on deployment strategies and scalable microservices.
works: Orchestrated web and mobile app development using ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS, React Native (Expo), and TypeScript, reducing prototype-to-MVP time by 20% and enhancing cross-platform functionality.
Designed robust deployment strategies with AWS EC2, S3, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines, decreasing deployment errors by 40% and improving system reliability.
Engineered scalable microservices using Flask and Python, enhancing backend response time by 30% and supporting growth of concurrent users.

experiences.title: Junior Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Led development of training management systems and AI-powered solutions, recognized with Star of the Quarter award.
works: Led the development of ansrTMS, reducing on-boarding time by 35% and boosting training completion rates; received Spot Award for project success.
Recognized with Star of the Quarter award for developing a custom LLM and chatbot that boosted client interaction efficiency by 25% and reduced support response times.
Elevated code quality in ansrTMS by leading peer reviews and enforcing SOLID design principles to ensure maintainability and scalability.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
experiences.description: Executed platform migrations and developed plagiarism detection tools while implementing comprehensive testing suites.
works: Executed migration of GranuLearn Admin and Player platforms to NextJS, enhancing code-base maintainability.
Independently developed the ansrEagle plagiarism detection tool, improving detection accuracy by 40% and supporting academic integrity initiatives.
Implemented comprehensive automated testing suites with Jest, increasing test coverage by 35% and reducing production bugs by 25%.

projects.title: ansrAccess - Accessibility Solution
projects.description: Enhanced data retrieval using optimized MongoDB aggregation pipelines, improving operational efficiency by 20%. Engineered AI-based alt-text generation to improve accessibility compliance, reducing manual effort by 40%. Implemented Redis caching strategies, reducing page load times by 25%. Technologies: NextJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Redis.

projects.title: ansrTMS - Training Scheduling & Management
projects.description: Designed and implemented a cohort-based training platform to automate scheduling, tracking, and completion of employee training, reducing manual oversight by 35%. Integrated Microsoft Teams and Outlook for scheduling, enabling automatic notifications and invites. Programmed a skill-based matching algorithm to auto-assign hosts to events, reducing manual scheduling overhead by 30%. Technologies: NextJS, NodeJS, MongoDB.

projects.title: GranuLearn - Learning Management System
projects.description: Developed and enhanced GranuLearn LMS, a comprehensive learning platform for training and building high-performing teams. Executed migration of admin portal and player to NextJS, enhancing code-base maintainability and performance. Created media-rich tools, gamified learning environment, and cross-platform sync across devices. Built collaborative features with secure messaging for interaction and knowledge sharing. Technologies: NextJS, ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB.

projects.title: Wildlife Awareness And Conservation Club
projects.description: Developed a website for a club promoting wildlife awareness and conservation, including user login, event registration, and news updates. Technologies used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP & MySQL.

projects.title: ARTY Client-side Website
projects.description: Built a website with Selling, Buying & Learning, Cart, and Favorite list features. Technologies used: HTML, CSS & JavaScript.
